title: SpaceX, Ocelots and the Mexican War
sub_head: With red tape like this, no wonder Elon Musk is turning Republican.
body:
Elon Musk on Tuesday officially defected from the Democratic Party. “I voted for Mayra Flores,” he said on Twitter , referring to the Republican candidate who flipped a Democratic House district in South Texas. “First time I ever voted Republican,” Mr. Musk added.
Yet is his political evolution any wonder? The man wants to fly to Mars, but check out the government’s red tape. The Federal Aviation Administration this week issued an environmental assessment of SpaceX’s plan to launch its Starship rocket from Boca Chica, Texas. The 40-page document outlines dozens of required mitigation measures, including:
